channel.title: Changelog Feed
channel.description: Changes for each version of the software.

item.title: Version 1.108.31 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.31

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Syncronization issue corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Correct header placement after expanded state change
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Column: add missing check for parent Table in _onLabelPropertyChange
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarRow: Appointments ARIA texts are correctly translated and localized now
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've updated the event parameters for status and readystate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: Dates label is now correct when used with utc formatter
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.semantic.MessagesIndicator: Add default tooltip
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the overlap issue in GenericTile when sap.m.TileSizeBehaviour.Small was being used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Stop initial re-rendering of the input field when type password and clear icon are set
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel#loadData: Don't use JSONP
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarRow: Appointments ARIA texts are correctly translated and localized now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add tooltips for calendar legend types

item.title: Version 1.108.36 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.36

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Footer handling improved
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: prevent default before press on mobile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: align current week calculations
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use duck typing to check DOM element in 'closestTo'
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: align current week calculations
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement

item.title: Version 1.108.34 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.34

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Content padding classes are applied to the header if additional class is present
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: buttons in split mode have separate tooltips
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: remove roledescription announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: fix page disappearing when scrolling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ProgressIndicator: Visual misalignment of percent value fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Fiori20Adapter: Performance issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: adjust value help icon settings
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: ResourceModel: Fix bundle reload after localizationChange

item.title: Version 1.108.35 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.35

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Height calculations for scrollable contents are preserved after invalidation
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/resource/ResourceModel#_handleLocalizationChange: wait for resource bundle to be loaded
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataListBinding: fire dataReceived event for aborted requests

item.title: Version 1.108.37 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.37

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessagePage: Icon ignored from screen readers
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/analytics/AnalyticalBinding#updateAnalyticalInfo: keep attribute properties in additional select

item.title: Version 1.120.17 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.17

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Suppress invalidation of footer
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Stop initial re-rendering of the input field when type password and clear icon are set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: icon is shown correctly now for theme horizon HCB and HCW. The status is now aligned correctly in sap.ui.table.Table.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Back type button has correct hover colour
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Parameter type is passed correctly to ResourceBundle
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel#loadData: Don't use JSONP
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.util.LibraryInfo: Loosen baseUrl regex check
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/.library: Remove wrong component for sap/ui/core/util/MockServer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.performance.XHRInterceptor: Fix CORS check
    • Type: FIX, Description: util/Mobile: update window size with delay after viewport is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap\ui\core\format\DateFormat.fnCreateDate: set UTCFullYear must be set with all components
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.DynamicSideContent: fixed firing of the breakpointChanged event
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: AnalyticalTable: Error when binding to named model
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add tooltips for calendar legend types
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Fix non-expanding Table

item.title: Version 1.120.18 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.18

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Resize issue with iframe content fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the overlap issue in GenericTile when sap.m.TileSizeBehaviour.Small was being used.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarRow: Appointments ARIA texts are correctly translated and localized now
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've updated the event parameters for status and readystate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.semantic.MessagesIndicator: Add default tooltip
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Add proper bottom margin for all navigation list items
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: fixed ushell styles for Horizon theme
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: BindingInfo: Ensure that named models are only parsed once
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControllerExtension support for TypeScript
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarRow: Appointments ARIA texts are correctly translated and localized now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Menu: Custom image icon is displayed correctly now

item.title: Version 1.120.19 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.19

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: actionBarExpanded now works when there is only one action item
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Syncronization issue corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Correct header placement after expanded state change
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnMenu: Check for container instance when setting visibility
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've made the subheader dynamic in the NewsContent when it is in a stretch tile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Column: add missing check for parent Table in _onLabelPropertyChange
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: rowmodes.Auto: Height calculation with margins

item.title: Version 1.120.21 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.21

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Revert
    • Type: FIX, Description: FCL: Restore focus same column fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Revert
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that UploadSet does not insert or removes any item if they are bound to a model
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Asteriks is visible when parent container has a set width
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Icon on Firefox is not cut now
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: buttons in split mode have separate tooltips
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Content padding classes are applied to the header if additional class is present
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Fixed incorrect ACC reading of required sap.m.Select
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: remove roledescription announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: fix page disappearing when scrolling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: adjust screen reader announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: properties string values are escaped when creating internal controls
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataListBinding: fire dataReceived event for aborted requests
    • Type: FIX, Description: Adjust link in sap.ui.core.MessageType documentation
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Calendar with two months in one column is displayed correctly now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.DatesRow: render week numbers
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageHeaderContent: correct box-shadow styles

item.title: Version 1.120.20 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.20

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced the fileSize parameter in fileSizeExceeded event of UploadSet
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnLayout: keep breakpoint classes stable on invalidation
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Table: Size of filter field in column menu

item.title: Version 1.120.22 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.22

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: menu items properties are handled correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Height calculations for scrollable contents are preserved after invalidation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the accessibility issue in aria-required-children within uploadCollection by changing the role 'option' to 'listitem'
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: prevent default before press on mobile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: : sap.m.Label: when the label is with percent width it works
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Fiori20Adapter: Performance issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Ensure colon and asterisk are always displayed by using flex box
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: adjust tooltip announcement
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use duck typing to check DOM element in 'closestTo'
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement

item.title: Version 1.120.23 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.23

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/analytics/AnalyticalBinding#updateAnalyticalInfo: keep attribute properties in additional select

item.title: Version 1.124.2 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.2

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridContainer: Fixed lost focus item navigation
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbarLayoutData: Typo fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButton: Added wrapping and wrapping type
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Stop initial re-rendering of the input field when type password and clear icon are set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: added possibility to select a day with a ENTER
    • Type: FIX, Description: ActionTile: New changes to align to the latest design
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButton: Text is not cut off by focus when text spacing is applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Parameter type is passed correctly to ResourceBundle
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Back type button has correct hover colour
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel#loadData: Don't use JSONP
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.ODataTreeBindingFlat: the value for the magnitude is always converted to a number
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.util.LibraryInfo: Loosen baseUrl regex check
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/.library: Remove wrong component for sap/ui/core/util/MockServer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.performance.XHRInterceptor: Fix CORS check
    • Type: FIX, Description: util/Mobile: update window size with delay after viewport is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap\ui\core\format\DateFormat.fnCreateDate: set UTCFullYear must be set with all components
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.DynamicSideContent: fixed firing of the breakpointChanged event
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: : sap.ui.rta: Show error dialog in case catalogsIds is returned empty from backend during catalog assignment for key user app variants.
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: AnalyticalTable: Error when binding to named model
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Month/Year/Year Range pickers visual improvements (SFSF)
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: is displayed correctly in RTL for two months view

item.title: Version 1.124.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.3

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Support aria-valuenow attribute
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fix table overlapping
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Resize issue with iframe content fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fix SR announcements when appointments are selected with keyboard.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Prevent appointment selection by pressing the Tab key
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added space between attributes and the action buttons in the ActionTile
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've made the subheader dynamic in the NewsContent when it is in a stretch tile
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've updated the event parameters for status and readystate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RatingIndicator: Icons visual issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the overlap issue in GenericTile when sap.m.TileSizeBehaviour.Small was being used.
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: fixed ushell styles for Horizon theme
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: BindingInfo: Ensure that named models are only parsed once
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControllerExtension support for TypeScript
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: rowmodes.Auto: Height calculation with margins
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fix SR announcements when appointments are selected with keyboard.

item.title: Version 1.124.4 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.4

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust more link tab order
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnLayout: keep breakpoint classes stable on invalidation

item.title: Version 1.124.5 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.5

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: fixed "select all" checkbox positioning
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Implement onfocusfail logic"
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced the fileSize parameter in fileSizeExceeded event of UploadSet
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: Adjust link in sap.ui.core.MessageType documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core: handle focus properly when disabling

item.title: Version 1.124.6 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.6

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that UploadSet does not insert or removes any item if they are bound to a model
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: fix page disappearing when scrolling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Content padding classes are applied to the header if additional class is present
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataListBinding: fire dataReceived event for aborted requests
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Calendar with two months in one column is displayed correctly now

item.title: Version 1.124.7 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.7

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Return correct row contexts when grouping
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: lazy loading with selected SubSection

item.title: Version 1.124.8 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.8

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Exact match with no autocomplete behavior corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Height calculations for scrollable contents are preserved after invalidation
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Timing issue fixed

item.title: Version 1.124.9 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.9

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: sync customData between outer and internal controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/analytics/AnalyticalBinding#updateAnalyticalInfo: keep attribute properties in additional select
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use duck typing to check DOM element in 'closestTo'
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Legend selected is translated correctly in German

item.title: Version 1.126.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.126.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridContainer: Fixed lost focus item navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Suppress invalidation of footer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.Card: Avoid double header focus visualization
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.RadioButton: Added wrapping and wrapping type
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: remove empty indicator when rendering icon
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.InputBase: Expose public methods for preferred interaction type
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Carousel: the page indicator can be placed over the content of the Carousel
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: missing title announcement for each row
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.LightBox: Error message is available for screen readers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbarLayoutData: Typo fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Stop initial re-rendering the input field when type password and clear icon are set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: added possibility to select a day with a ENTER
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Fixed type in TNT library
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.InputBase: Value state message link is now clickable
    • Type: FIX, Description: Documentation: Parameter types are now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: redundant haspopup attribute removed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: fire press onkeyup
    • Type: FIX, Description: ActionTile: New changes to align to the latest design
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarMonthGrid: enable mouse selection for More link
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButton: Text is not cut off by focus when text spacing is applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SplitContainer: Fine tuned code control after deprecated property
    • Type: FIX, Description: Form: RadioButton - focus overlaps text
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Apply focus if page indicator arrow is pressed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Value is not cleared on invalidation when type password is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: improve demo app sample reagarding accessibility
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Fixed type in TNT library
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationList: Border styles now have correct values in all themes
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel#loadData: Don't use JSONP
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.ODataTreeBindingFlat: the value for the magnitude is always converted to a number
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.util.LibraryInfo: Loosen baseUrl regex check
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/.library: Remove wrong component for sap/ui/core/util/MockServer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v4.Context#requestSibling: fix request syntax
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.performance.XHRInterceptor: Fix CORS check
    • Type: FIX, Description: util/Mobile: update window size with delay after viewport is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Demo Kit: Support line-through tags
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Improve Scrolling in Landscape Mode on Mobile Devices
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Fix API reference search result list item navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demokit: Version-info initialization corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demokit: IndexEntry controller definition corrected
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.integration.widget.Card: Add fitType property to icons in List and Table content
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Introduce displayZeroValue option for StackedBar micro chart
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.integration.widgets.Card: All elements of a List card item are read out
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: FormContainer: expander announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: FormContainer: invalid role rendered in ColumnLayout
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: mdc.FilterBar: improve focus handling of filter fields
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.InputBase: Expose public methods for preferred interaction type
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: The filter info bar must be labelled with its text
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: old unit used after Field was initialized
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: parsing nested brackets
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.rta: Key user app variant delete button is always disabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.rta: Prevent set focus on not existing key user app variant overview table
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: AnalyticalTable: Error when binding to named model
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Month/Year/Year Range pickers visual improvements
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: is displayed correctly in RTL for two months view
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add tooltips for calendar legend types
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: change event fire once
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: adjust change event firing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: change cursor for header buttons
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: remove redundant required announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Currency: the currency is not truncating now
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSection: Title alignment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Inconsistent header-collapsing corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: FormContainer: invalid role rendered in ColumnLayout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: lazy loading with selected SubSection

item.title: Version 1.126.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.126.1

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Show footer after calling setShowFooter twice
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControllerExtension support for TypeScript

item.title: Version 1.127.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fix table overlapping
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Invalid resize prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Cleanup move listeners on destroy
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Syncronization issue corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Resize issue with iframe content fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Correct header placement after expanded state change
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: add menu item selection functionality
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.DatePicker, sap.m.DateTimePicker, sap.m.DateRangeSelection: add picker accessible name
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m Input: new 'fromKeyboard' parameter is now added to the valueHelpRequest event
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: add group type "Data" to value property
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: added defaultClass to the items aggregation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fix SR announcements when all-day appointments are selected with keyboard.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: add value state message to mobile numeric picker
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fix SR announcements when appointments are selected with keyboard.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Prevent unnecessary scroll
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: remove roledescription announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SelectDialog,TableSelectDialog: Set focus to the initially focusable element after selection is reset
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: Prevent appointment selection by pressing the Tab key
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: propagate row selection to table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've made the subheader dynamic in the NewsContent when it is in a stretch tile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: Provide additional testing control instance for the visual test
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Remove warning message when using sap.ui.core.HTML
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Change of library dependency to layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: Prevent appointment selection by pressing the Tab key
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Column: add missing check for parent Table in _onLabelPropertyChange
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Fix title / text alignment of inverted status
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: align test page example
    • Type: FIX, Description: Fiori20Adapter: Strengthened the check for the navigation back button
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Dragging is no longer interrupted by selection at the same time
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Custom footer can be reached with Shift+Tab
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Table: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarRow: Appointments ARIA texts are correctly translated and localized now
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now updated the event parameters for the status and readystate document types in the Uploadcompleted event of Uploadset control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: fixed accessing inner controls with tab
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: Last and Next options title is now correctly retrieved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: fix page disappearing when scrolling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Arrow navigation issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: close the popover if the opener is not visible
    • Type: FIX, Description: GenericTile overlap happening when sap.m.TileSizeBehavior.Small is used.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RatingIndicator: Icons visual issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Show footer after calling setShowFooter twice
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: update appointment styling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: improve screen reader announcements
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: fixed ushell styles for Horizon theme
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: add menu item selection functionality
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Provide base variables as custom CSS properties
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Make sap/ui/test/nextUIUpdate publically available
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.LocaleData#requestInstance: Enable synchronous instance creation
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: avoid 'focusfail' when the control still has focus
    • Type: FIX, Description: BindingInfo: Ensure that named models are only parsed once
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/dom/findTabbable: replace recursion with iteration
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControllerExtension support for TypeScript
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: close the popover if the opener is not visible
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demokit: Remove deprecated sap.f.IllustratedMessage
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demokit: Replace deprecated sap.m.MessagePage
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Entity updated
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Correct anchor link target in API reference
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Avoid more than one WebPage card load timeout
    • Type: FIX, Description: Calendar controls: fixed visual glitches
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.Splitter: getFocusDomRef now returns correct DOM element
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.VerticalLayout: update documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: SimpleFormDesigntime: hide propery change on inner Form
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: on typeahead no information about result announced
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Table: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: add menu item selection functionality
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: added defaultClass to the items aggregation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fix SR announcements when appointments are selected with keyboard.
    • Type: FIX, Description: Calendar controls: fixed visual glitches
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarRow: Appointments ARIA texts are correctly translated and localized now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Menu: Image icon has correct size now
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: lazy loading with correct scroll pos

item.title: Version 1.127.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.1

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Content padding classes are applied to the header if additional class is present
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: fixed "select all" checkbox positioning
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Fix failing tests
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataListBinding: fire dataReceived event for aborted requests
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnLayout: keep breakpoint classes stable on invalidation
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Calendar with two months in one column is displayed correctly now

item.title: Version 1.127.2 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.2

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Return correct row contexts when grouping

item.title: Version 1.127.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.3

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the no data description for cases where uploadEnabled is set to false
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the minimum height issue for the no data page in uploadSet control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Height calculations for scrollable contents are preserved after invalidation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: sync customData between outer and internal controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of truncating characters in the GenericTile header section by removing the usage of sap.m.Text deprecated method
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Exact match with no autocomplete behavior corrected
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use duck typing to check DOM element in 'closestTo'

item.title: Version 1.127.4 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.4

  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/analytics/AnalyticalBinding#updateAnalyticalInfo: keep attribute properties in additional select

item.title: Version 1.128.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.128.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.CardBase: Introduced CardBadgeCustomData
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: New layoutData introduced
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Support aria-valuenow attribute
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: icon with empty src is not rendered in the expanded side content
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar and SinglePlanningCalendar: Adding the ability to repeat non-working periods
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Keyboard arrow navigation added
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now introduced the fileSize parameter in fileSizeExceeded event of UploadSet
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: CellSelector: Allow selection with Row/RowOnly
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Increase resize handle size
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Popover: Increase resize handle size
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure that as per the guidelines the line-height on the linkTileContents has been set to 1.5rem
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Drag and drop in Hours view is now with 15 minutes minimum step
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Link: Add icon and endIcon functionality
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: CellSelector: Shift + Click now extends the selection
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Revert some of resize handle size changes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Improve overflow handling when there is scrollable content
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: adjust testing page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendarLegend: adjust accessibility semantics
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust accessibility semantics
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the no data description for cases where uploadEnabled is set to false
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageView: Correct group headers aria attributes and count
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: adjust internal title press handling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Height calculations for scrollable contents are preserved after invalidation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageView: Fix failing qUNit test
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: adjust display in a form
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: links with empty href attribute work correctly now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Fiori20Adapter: Performance issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: default alternative text is set for icon only statuses which icons can't be found in the Icon Registry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Fix failing tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: modal popover is not auto closed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: ARIA in empty mode is correct now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Text only filter line-height is fixed for Hindi
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageView: Update details page on model update
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: added defaultClass to the items aggregation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the height of the Selection Details popover can be adjusted without the use of custom code
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fix SR announcements when all-day appointments are selected with keyboard.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Icon only status has a tooltip if the provided icon / image has default one
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Accessible Improvement for Button test page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: Accessible Improvement for MenuButton test page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SelectDialog,TableSelectDialog: Ensure that selection count is announced after title
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added space between attributes and the action buttons in the ActionTile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust more link tab order
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now updated the tab reading order for the FeedListItem control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimeInput: Remove an accessibility test page
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: Adjust link in sap.ui.core.MessageType documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataTreeBinding#_loadCompleteTreeWithAnnotations: read all data in "Client" mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v4.AnnotationHelper: DoNotCheckScaleOfMeasuredQuantity
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Fix query parameter only for documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demokit: Remove deprecated sap.f.IllustratedMessage
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.CardBase: Introduced CardBadgeCustomData
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Increase resize handle size
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Add fallbackSrc to images in Object cards
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: The text of the Object Status is aligned vertically with the icon
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.ResponsiveFlowLayout: adding an accessibility test page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.form.ResponsiveGridLayout: fix JSDoc links to sap.ui.layout.GridData
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnLayout: keep breakpoint classes stable on invalidation
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Operator: do not use Messagebundle to check if a text exist
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: wrong icon for default value help
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelp: wrong input still shown on reopen
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelp: Screenreader announces "has Dialog" on Tokenizer
    • Type: FIX, Description: FieldBase: Typeahead opens too if Dialog opens
    • Type: FIX, Description: Table: Size of filter field in column menu
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: rowmodes.Auto: Height calculation with margins
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar and SinglePlanningCalendar: Adding the ability to repeat non-working periods
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.unified.RecurrenceNonWorkingPeriod: NonWorkingPeriod can be recurring
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: added defaultClass to the items aggregation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarDateInterval: adding an accessibility test page
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayoutABHelper: Address SyntaxError
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageHeaderContent: correct box-shadow styles
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayoutABHelper: Address SyntaxError
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: CSS issue for sap_hcb corected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxpa.ObjectPageSubSection: Improved key handling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: lazyloading with content size update
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageHeader: fix duplicated buttons

item.title: Version 1.129.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.129.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Revert
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: fixed resizing when Side Panel is left-positioned
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: fixed side content closing on mobile device
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.Card: Header now has correct height when only toolbar is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: List 'info' is now correctly displayed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fix Popover scroll in sample
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fix pin button visibility
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now added the carousel behaviour, and increased the tap area for the indicators on the SlideTile control
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.MessageStrip: Displaying multiple links is now enabled
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: add group type "Data" to value property
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.ObjectIdentifier & ObjectNumber: add group type "Data" to value property
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: show busy indicator while rows loading
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Prevent null within area resize observer deregistration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Icon explorer scroll fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Revert
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Fix error caused by inaccessible DOM ref
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Return correct row contexts when grouping
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: add empty value description in the acc info
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageView: Title link is now truncated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Empty page message resizes correctly in vertical direction
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Event is fired correctly on pressing SPACE without scrolling the page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NavContainer: Unstable test
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Token: extend touch area for horizon themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: navigate to correct month in islamic calendar
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: prevent default before press for mobile safari
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Asteriks is visible when parent container has a set width
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed sap-desktop attribute to provide consistent focus across all devices
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: add today announcement for the grid cell
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectListItem: adding an accessibility test page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: prevent press on right click
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Content padding classes are applied to the header if additional class is present
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Icon on Firefox is not cut now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: align the placeholder reference with other inputs
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: Accessible Improvement for ObjectIdentifier test page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that UploadSet does not insert or removes any item if they are bound to a model
    • Type: FIX, Description: SinglePlanningCalendar: Change in the z-index of the header
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.StepInput: The valueStateText is given priority.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: fixed "select all" checkbox positioning
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Revert some of resize handle size changes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: buttons in split mode have separate tooltips
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ColorPalettePopover: synch selected color with inner palette
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: List 'info' is now correctly displayed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We ensure that the UploadSetwithTable plugin now uses currentContexts for file preview
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Proper positioning of a non-work period.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the content maintained within the GenericTile does not extended beyond the control
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Fixed the spacing between links
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: properties string values are escaped when creating internal controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageBox: Added missing documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.QuickView: Title and description wrap correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: set default width
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataListBinding: fire dataReceived event for aborted requests
    • Type: FIX, Description: Samples failing tests fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/DataState.js: consider also the control dirty state of the parent data state
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/format/NumberFormat: allow parsing empty string for Currencies and Units if showNumber is false
    • Type: FIX, Description: core.Icon sample - ensure style.css is loaded
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Fix query parameter only for documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Change info fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.fl.write.api.FieldExtensibility: Adds information about relevant business objects to the extension data.
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration cards: ComboBoxFilter now has selectedIndex option
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: List 'info' is now correctly displayed
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelp: arrow navigation for multi-value
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.rta: Remove "Hidden" object mutation in context based toolbar model
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Table: Cleanup Interactive Row Count Mode
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sa.ui.unified.Menu: 'closed' event added
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Calendar with two months in one column is displayed correctly now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Currency: adding an accessibility test page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.ColorPicker: adjust tab order in large HSL mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Proper positioning of a non-work period.
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Timing issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.LazyLoading: prevent loading of unneeded Sections
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Fix failing test for 2.0
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Fix wrong scrolling to Section
  • Library: deprecated
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.upload.Uploader#undefined] replaced by {@link sap.m.upload.UploaderTableItem}
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.upload.UploadSetItem#undefined] replaced by {@link sap.m.upload.UploadItem}
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.upload.UploadSetToolbarPlaceholder#undefined] replaced by {@link sap.m.upload.ActionsPlaceholder}
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.upload.UploadSet#undefined] replaced by {@link sap.m.plugins.UploadSetwithTable}

item.title: Version 1.130.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Add fitType property for icons in Header and Object Card content
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: New pagination experience
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Adjust Badge creation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageTitle: Fix focus lost on actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.CardBadgeCustomData: CardBadgeVisibilityMode is added to type descriptor
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.CalendarInCard: Now allows 12 hour format of appointment time
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: Add new options
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Carousel: On touch devices navigation arrows are always visible
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: CellSelector: Provide selection change event
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: menu items properties are handled correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Correct value restoration after backspace
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: sync customData between outer and internal controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed sap.m.upload.UploadSetwithTable deprecated control along with its files and folders from the repository, since it was introduced as an experimental control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: doesn't show scroll bar if not needed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: translations are now correclty applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Slider, sap.m.RangeSlider: Documentation update
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Exact match with no autocomplete behavior corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the correct list item is selected when the setSelectedItemById API is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Upload button has a left margin same as other buttons in the table action row
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now updated the filetypeMismatch event to send the correct filetype or mimetype
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: update documentation regarding wrapping behavior of the control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageView: invalidate details page before navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RatingIndicator: Display only compact indicator fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: : sap.m.Label: when the label is with percent width it works
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the UploadEnabled property setting enables or disables drag and drop that is attached from the plugin
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: add week announcement to grid cells
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: new CSS class for languages with higher line heights
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Prevent null within area resize observer deregistration
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of truncating characters in the GenericTile header section by removing the usage of sap.m.Text deprecated method
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Ensure colon and asterisk are always displayed by using flex box
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Icon explorer scroll fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: FESR: Enhance FESR to enable reporting of integration env
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use duck typing to check DOM element in 'closestTo'
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/cldr/*.json: fix translations for sap-calendarWeek.narrow and .wide
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat#format: CLDR data for currencies is considered correctly without currency customizing
    • Type: FIX, Description: dom/findTabbable: return when meet the scope element twice
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v4.lib._AggregationCache: use undefined instead of null for dimensions or aggregates not present in a row
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.fl: Fixed page freezing after deleting a variant
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.CalendarInCard: Now allows 12 hour format of appointment time
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.CalendarInCard: Add support for calendarWeekNumbering
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: request method now supports FormData
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Add fitType property for icons in Header and Object Card content
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Cards opened by ShowCard or paginator now have preset dimensions
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: New pagination experience
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Avoid horizontally overflowing content in ShowCard action dialog
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.Splitter: Native pull-to-refresh is now not triggered when dragging splitter bar
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: MDCTable: Enable Interactive Row Mode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: ActionToolbar: combine / split RTA
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field with ValueHelp: number of items not announced
    • Type: FIX, Description: MTable: arrow navigation on closed ValueHelp not working
    • Type: FIX, Description: MTable: announce no-data text if used a dropdown
    • Type: FIX, Description: MTable: ValueHelpDelegate.UpdateBinding not called in phone
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: use sap.ui.core.ILabelable interface
    • Type: FIX, Description: RangeOperator: runtime error if longText contains special characters
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.CalendarInCard: Now allows 12 hour format of appointment time
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.ColorPicker: tooltip is displayed now for the current and new color box
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarLegend: Filtering of elements by the color property
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Typo fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Timing issue fixed

item.title: Version 1.130.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.1

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: icon only link is now clickable
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust grid cell description
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendarLegend: adjust accessibility semantics
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat#format: Do not apply currency customizing for decimals on currency formats, if format option "style: 'long'/'short'" is set
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendarLegend: adjust accessibility semantics

item.title: Version 1.38.63 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.38.63

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: Formatting issue fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Prepare for upcoming 'unload' event deprecation and deprecate APIs 'onWindowBeforeUnload', 'onWindowUnload' and 'onWindowError' in 'sap/ui/core/Component'

item.title: Version 1.71.68 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.71.68

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Qunit in IE fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessagePage: Icon ignored from screen readers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: prevent default before press on mobile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Add tooltip to the up and down arrow buttons
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationList: ARIA roles are now correct
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add tooltips for calendar legend types

item.title: Version 1.71.67 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.71.67

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Fiori20Adapter: Performance issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Stop initial re-rendering the input field when type password and clear icon are set
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel#loadData: Don't use JSONP
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/.library: Remove wrong component for sap/ui/core/util/MockServer
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Header buttons are displayed correctly in two months view

item.title: Version 1.84.47 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.84.47

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Stop initial re-rendering of the input field when type password and clear icon are set
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel#loadData: Don't use JSONP
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/.library: Remove wrong component for sap/ui/core/util/MockServer
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Header buttons are displayed correctly in two months view
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: change event listener is reattached correctly now

item.title: Version 1.84.48 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.84.48

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessagePage: Icon ignored from screen readers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: prevent default before press on mobile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Fiori20Adapter: Performance issue fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: align current week calculations

item.title: Version 1.96.33 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.96.33

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Syncronization issue corrected
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: buttons in split mode have separate tooltips
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Fiori20Adapter: Performance issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
  • Library: sap.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: ResourceModel: Fix bundle reload after localizationChange

item.title: Version 1.96.32 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.96.32

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the overlap issue in GenericTile when sap.m.TileSizeBehaviour.Small was being used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Stop initial re-rendering of the input field when type password and clear icon are set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Back type button has correct hover colour
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel#loadData: Don't use JSONP
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/.library: Remove wrong component for sap/ui/core/util/MockServer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests

item.title: Version 1.96.35 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.96.35

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: prevent default before press on mobile
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: align current week calculations

item.title: Version 1.96.36 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.96.36

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessagePage: Icon ignored from screen readers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Prevent closing of Popover after lazy loading content
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Add tooltip to the up and down arrow buttons
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add tooltips for calendar legend types

item.title: Version 1.96.34 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.96.34

  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/resource/ResourceModel#_handleLocalizationChange: wait for resource bundle to be loaded
